```bash
pytenter/
├── pytenter/                     # Main package folder 
│   ├── __init__.py               # Makes the folder a package
│   └── pytenter.py               # the main code
├── LICENSE                       # the license
├── README.md                     # Project documentation
├── setup.py                      # Package setup file
└── requirements.txt              # Dependencies list

```
